name: Extended Realities and Networked Voices
description:
This exhibition will take you on a journey through different platforms and devices (desktop, smartphone, VR headset). You’ll be able to walk through our online exhibition space and explore what kind of variety the virtual can provide.

“Expanded Realities and Networked Voices” explores the consequences of virtuality and even looks beyond our digital screens. The exhibition serves as a place to experience virtual art in its native environment while also being a vehicle to learn and understand our analogue world and global society AFK (away from keyboard). 

look around by clicking and dragging, move forward by holding the mouse pressed or use W, A, S, D or the arrow keys to navigate. double click on the artwork preview portals (allow pop-ups!) and you will be teleported to the artworks each format!
